benchmark_details.name: MEDFRAME QA
benchmark_details.overview: MEDFRAME QA is the first benchmark explicitly designed to evaluate multi-image reasoning in medical visual question answering (VQA), consisting of 2,851 VQA pairs from medical videos.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate multi-image reasoning capabilities of MLLMs in clinical scenarios similar to real-world diagnostic situations.

data.source: Extracted from 3,420 medical videos available on YouTube.
data.annotation: Automatically generated via an automated pipeline using GPT-4 for image filtering, caption alignment, and question generation.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy calculated based on the percentage of correctly answered questions by models.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance of models in multi-image reasoning tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: Most models performed with accuracies below 50%.
methodology.validation: Validation through automated and manual quality checks ensuring question complexity and relevance.
